expt_aim: differentiating meanings of sentences and nuances of meanings
expt_gen: I had a little trouble with the sentence with numbers.  the meanings were the same, but because the numbers were different, I marked dissimmilar.  Hope I didn't mess up your numbers.  Thanks.
sent2: I really enjoy going sailing with my father.
I really don't like eating out at upscale places..
The shirt was either striped or soft.
He thought the cookie was good.
Some but not all of the weekends were sunny.
She liked but didn't love the movie.
Three of the students were tired.
sent1: I really enjoy walking in the woods alone.
The shirt was striped and soft.
The players were sometimes but not always skillful.
He thought the cookie was excellent.
All of the weekends were sunny.
Two of the students were tired.
